examples: Over seven hundred Facebook users have already liked the company’s website.
He likes the comfortable seats and big screen at the movie theater.
By the next morning, over twenty of my friends had liked my new profile picture.
Like the commandments written in stone.
Such helps were like drop in the ocean.
words.defineEn: to feel that someone or something is good, enjoyable, or interesting
words.defineVi: để cảm thấy rằng một ai đó hoặc một cái gì đó là tốt, thú vị, hoặc thú vị

examples: After all, love will find a way.
He loved gardening.
They loved the sun-dried tomato and mozzarella-filled pansotti.
I love the vibrant green color of Granny Smith apples.
I love the crunch of romaine lettuce in my sandwiches.
words.defineEn: to have very strong feelings for someone or something that is important to us and we like a lot and want to take care of
words.defineVi: có tình cảm rất mãnh liệt với ai đó hoặc điều gì đó quan trọng đối với chúng ta và chúng ta rất thích và muốn chăm sóc

examples: That guy really hates my guts.
I hate shopping.
Everybody hates the sight of you.
I hate summer vacation.
Before all this, I just hated the sight of him.
words.defineEn: to really not like something or someone
words.defineVi: để thực sự không thích một cái gì đó hoặc một ai đó

examples: These comments are horrible.
The footage from this is absolutely horrible.
Babies' got horrible taste!
But the grammar is horrible.
Because the relationship with Peach was horrible.
words.defineVi: cực kỳ khó chịu, xấu, hoặc khó chịu

examples: Winter brings a peaceful silence, especially after a fresh snowfall.
She lived a very peaceful life.
He enjoys the peaceful atmosphere of his home.
I usually have a peaceful sleep at night.
The once peaceful beach town has now become completely commercialised.
words.defineEn: (of a person) unwilling to become involved in a dispute or anything violent
words.defineVi: (của một người) không muốn tham gia vào một cuộc tranh chấp hoặc bất cứ điều gì bạo lực

examples: As frightened as I am to die, I'm also curious to know what it's like beyond the veil.
The villagers are very frightened of his ghost.
Mr Edgar looked very frightened.
I was kind of frightened.
I was definitely frightened.
words.defineVi: cảm thấy sợ hãi hoặc lo lắng

examples: Only a minority of people exist on unemployment benefits alone.
Some things are best left well alone.
Going mountain-climbing alone is dicing with death.
I quite understand that you need some time alone.
It was so irresponsible of him to leave his children in the car all alone.
words.defineEn: without any other people; on one's own
words.defineVi: không có bất kỳ người nào khác; một mình

examples: In 2018 the party had 10 000 members.
That party was off the hook!
The party continued into the wee small hours.
The party is on Friday evening.
But the party was over all too quickly for little Nicole.
words.defineEn: an event where people get together and enjoy themselves by talking, dancing, eating, drinking, etc.
words.defineVi: một sự kiện nơi mọi người gặp nhau và tận hưởng bằng cách nói chuyện, khiêu vũ, ăn, uống, v.v.

examples: The news of the accident made him fall to pieces, and he couldn't concentrate on anything.
In my political work I try to concentrate on the big picture and not be distracted by details.
Just concentrate!
Battery production around the world is concentrated in Northeast Asia.
Around the edges of sunspots, the magnetic field lines are concentrated.
words.defineEn: to focus one's all attention on something specific
words.defineVi: để tập trung tất cả sự chú ý của một người vào một cái gì đó cụ thể

examples: The cruise went very quickly.
Generally, the article reads very well.
The car holds the corners very well.
Her condition is very serious.
The design is very basic.
words.defineEn: to a great extent or degree
words.defineVi: đến một mức độ lớn hoặc mức độ

examples: Guy sneezed loudly.
We cheer loudly for our favorite soccer team during the match.
We cheer loudly for our school's volleyball team during their matches.
To laugh loudly/aloud/heartily.
Startled by the sudden noise, the baby began to cry loudly.
words.defineEn: producing a sound or noise with high volume
words.defineVi: tạo ra âm thanh hoặc tiếng ồn với âm lượng lớn
